text: Sphacteria ( - Sfaktiria, in 19th century context also Sphagia) is a small island at the entrance to the bay of Pylos in the Peloponnese, Greece. It was the site of three battles: *the 425 BC Battle of Sphacteria in the Peloponnesian war.Diodorus Siculus, 12.61-63 *the 1825 AD Battle of Sphacteria in the Greek War of Independence from the Ottoman Empire *the 1827 AD Battle of Navarino, also in the Greek War of Independence Sphacteria from the East ==References== Category:Ionian Islands Category:Landforms of Messenia Category:Pylos Category:Islands of Peloponnese (region) Category:Islands of Greece
title: Sphacteria
